# Protocol 21 - Blackjack Card Counting App & Trainer

> Protocol 21 is the best blackjack card counting trainer app for iOS and Android. We help players learn and master card counting systems through casino-grade drills and simulations.

## About

Protocol 21 is a professional-grade training application designed for serious advantage players who want to learn blackjack card counting. Unlike simple flashcard apps, Protocol 21 simulates real casino conditions including dealer speeds, background noise, and visual distractions.

The app supports six major card counting systems:
- Hi-Lo (Beginner, Balanced) - The most popular system
- KO/Knock-Out (Beginner, Unbalanced) - No true count conversion needed
- Omega II (Advanced, Balanced) - Level 2 with ace side counts
- Zen Count (Intermediate, Balanced) - High betting correlation
- Red 7 (Beginner, Unbalanced) - Color-dependent values
- Wong Halves (Expert, Balanced) - Fractional calculations

Key training drills include:
- True Count Conversion - Mental math for dividing running count by decks remaining
- Deck Estimation - Visual accuracy training for estimating remaining decks
- Speed Counting - Reaction time training at casino dealing speeds

## Key Facts

- Card counting is legal - it uses mental skill, not cheating
- Hi-Lo is recommended for beginners
- True count = Running count รท Decks remaining
- Casino-ready proficiency typically takes 2-3 months of daily practice
- Protocol 21 is free to download with optional Pro features
